StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateCandidateEduca.on]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@MarineCandidateID int ,@SchoolCode int ,@Educa.onLevel varchar(2) ,@SchoolEndDate date.me ,@Educa.onTier varchar(2) ,@Educa.onCode char(1) ,@CivilianEduca.onMajorCode varchar(2) ,@ProjectedComple.onDate date.me --,@FirstSenior char(1) ,@Veri.ca.on varchar(10) --,@Cumula.veGPA .oat --,@HighMathLevel varchar(2) --,@CurrentGPA .oat --,@CreditHours int --,@FullTimeStudent char(1) ,@ProjectedTier int ,@UserLogin varchar(15)) AS
UPDATE [dbo].[CANDIDATE_EDUCATION] SET [SCHOOL_END_DATE] = @SchoolEndDate ,[EDUCATION_TIER] = @Educa.onTier ,[EDUCATION_CODE] = @Educa.onCode ,[CIVILIAN_EDUCATION_MAJOR_CODE] = @CivilianEduca.onMajorCode ,[PROJECTED_COMPL_DATE] = @ProjectedComple.onDate --,[FIRST_SENIOR] = @FirstSenior ,[VERIFICATION] = @Veri.ca.on --,[CUMULATIVE_GPA] = @Cumula.veGPA --,[HIGH_MATH_LEVEL] = @HighMathLevel --,[CURRENT_GPA] = @CurrentGPA --,[CREDIT_HOURS] = @CreditHours --,[FULL_TIME_STUDENT] = @FullTimeStudent ,[PROJECTED_TIER] = @ProjectedTier ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateID AND SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode AND EDUCATION_LEVEL = @Educa.onLevel
